Name: HORDE Survival
About the game: - Explore a vast open world filled with many building and areas - Fight against the living and the dead - Hunt animals for food - Improve your skills overtime by gathering experience - Trade goods with other survivors - Build or occupy an existing house - Collect or buy guns from other survivors - Use tools to gather resources such as wood or minerals - Burn down hordes of zombies
